name: Data Science Prime
description: Data Science Prime app gives you a concise overview of data science and how to get started.It serves as an aid,a learning guide for data science This app features various cheat sheets and references on Python,Julia,R,SQL,Machine Learning(Scikit Learn),Big Data such as Hadoop,Hive and interesting aspects of Data Science,Data Analysis and Business Analysis.  Why Data Science Prime ? The purpose of this app is to help individuals learn Data Science with ease and to get an overview of all that data science offers. It is to serve as a guide, a reference and a learning kit for data scientists and non-data scientists,future data scientist,and every one who is interested in data.  With Data Science Prime you can:  * Get a General Overview of Data Science * Learn who a data scientist is and is not and how to become one. * Learn the Pathway to becoming a Data Scientist, * Explore the world of data science * Offline Search for Data Science Glossary * Compare Python,R,Matlab and Julia Basic Cheats * Learn the basics of various programming languages and some selected libraries for Data Science such as Python Pandas,Julia DataFrames,R Caret and DataTable etc. * Learn Machine Learning in brief and their various algorithms * Data Science news feeds * Data Science Cheatsheets * Find various resources and awesome list for data science * Find some Interview Questions and Answers for Data Science * Brief overview of Artificial Intelligence,Internet of Things(IOT),Web of Things(WOT) and intelligence of things. * Many more  Explore the World of Data Science and get started with Data Science   Send us your feedback to make Data Science Prime better Thanks
